reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: INT/Organizational support for the Finnish Committee for UNICEF

description.narrative: The association is the national committee of the United Nations Children's Fund. UNICEF is the guardian of the Convention on the Rights of the Child (CRC) and the Convention forms the basis for the programme and advocacy work both domestically and internat ionally. UNICEF Finland promotes the well-being of the children in the development countries by collecting funds to the programmes implemented by United Nations Children's Fund. The national committees commit a minimum of 75% of the fundraised resources to UNICEFs Regular Resources. The association also carries out significant development education and information work focusing on the UN Sustainable Development Goals from a childs position and rights point of view. The Finnish Committee for UNICEF applies t he organisational support for the general activities as well information and development education.
